name: A.R.1 - The Action Robot
description:
AR1 is a robot that goes to the center of the earth to prevent that the surface is flooded by water. For this, the robot has to go through four scenarios, divided into 4 levels with different obstacles. At each level something new appears.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrows to movement;
  • E or Spacebar is the action key;
  • Joystick Support
